net.sf.JRecord.schema

Class CobolSchemaReader<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.JRecord.IO.builders.CblIOBuilderBase<IOB>
      • net.sf.JRecord.IO.builders.CblIOBuilderMultiSchemaBase<T>
        • net.sf.JRecord.schema.CobolSchemaReader<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    INewLineCreator, ISchemaIOBuilder, net.sf.JRecord.IO.builders.IGetLoader

    public class CobolSchemaReader<T>
extends net.sf.JRecord.IO.builders.CblIOBuilderMultiSchemaBase<T>
implements ISchemaIOBuilder
    Purpose: Read a Cobol-Copybook and create:
    • JRecord-Layout (file schema)
    • Cobol Item Tree - A Cobol-Item tree complete with JRecord-Field Details / Array Details. This Item Tree can be used to create Xml (as in Cobol2Xml), JSon (forthcoming Cobol2Json utility), Avro etc.
    • IOBuilder IOBuilder for the Layout.
    Author:
    Bruce Martin
